concept.title: Prevent Objects from Being Selected
concept.shortdesc: You can prevent objects frombeing selected by locking the layer. Because locking layer means that you can do any operations except for editing objects on this layer. You can set the locked layer as the cur ent layer and add objects as well as using requiring command (such as LIST) and Objects Snap.

conbody.p: You can control whether you select objects first or type a command first, whether the selected objects are highlighted, how to define the selection area, how to create a selection set.
